directions: Rinse tofu; place in a covered container and freeze 8 hours to overnight. Thaw at least 2 hours and drain thoroughly. Place tofu onto a plate and place another plate on top. Set a 3- to 5-pound weight on top. Press tofu for 20 to 30 minutes; drain and discard the accumulated liquid. Pat dry and cut into cubes.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and salt together in a bowl. Pour into a resealable plastic bag; add tofu and seal. Marinate in the refrigerator, 2 to 3 hours.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package extra-firm tofu, or more to taste
1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon onion powder, or more to taste
title: Vegan Tofu 'Feta Cheese'
